summary: My first retexture, an \"HD\"/Hi-Res Imperial Sword
descriptionHtml:
I decided to upscale the texture of the Imperial Sword, from 512x512 to 1024x1024. It looks great, not too blurry, since I sharpened it in GIMP. Also, this is my first retexture that I\'ve uploaded to the Nexus, although I\'ve been lurking and downloading for a good few months, maybe a year. 

To install, just unpack the .rar and place the \"textures\" folder in your data folder. If you\'ve already got a textures folder in your data folder, just tell it to replace it.
author: SlayerXX33398
